scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tscpaths -p tsconfig.build.json -s ./src -o ./dist
scripts.link: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tscpaths -p tsconfig.build.json -s ./src -o ./dist && copy package.json dist && copy README.md dist && cd dist && npm link
scripts.dist: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tscpaths -p tsconfig.build.json -s ./src -o ./dist && copy package.json dist && copy README.md dist && cd dist && npm publish --access public
